name: The Amazing GentleBot
description:
Witness the daring acrobatics of The GentleBot 1000! Featuring simple controls, with a riveting twist! A button will change every round! Demonstrate true dexterous prowess as you physically manipulate your fingers across your keyboard in manners you never imagined! (Or asked for...) Be sure to avoid pressing that pesky self-destruct button, as you double-jump out of harm's way.

Made during the Game Maker Toolkit Game Jam 2020! The theme for this year is "Out of Control". This marks our first
attempt at a game jam which served as an invaluable learning experience.
Special thanks to Mark Brown for hosting this event. We are looking forward to the next one.

Core Team
Programming - Spagato
Art - Keith Garces

Music - ElectroHarbour

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/436790

Button Prompt Graphics - Retrocade Media

Purchase their assets here: https://retrocademedia.itch.io/buttonprompts4
